mapper.select: SELECT no,shopName,title,orderCount,payment,date FROM sale WHERE date >= #{param1} and date <=#{param2} ORDER BY no
SELECT date,category,title,no,orderCount,sellPrice FROM sale ORDER BY date, no
SELECT coName,date,shopName,title,category,orderCount,supPrice FROM sale ORDER BY coname,date
SELECT shopName, sum(orderCount) as totalCnt FROM sale group by shopName
select shopName,sum(m) as result from (select shopname,orderCount*sellPrice m from sale) temp group by shopName order by result desc;
select shopName,title,orderCount,payment,sellPrice from sale order by shopName
select distinct shopName from sale order by shopName
select shopName,title,orderCount,payment,sellPrice from sale where shopName = #{shopName} order by title
select title,category,coName,(orderCount*supPrice) supAmount, (orderCount*sellPrice) saleAmount, ((orderCount*sellPrice)-(orderCount*supPrice)) saleProfits from sale

select title,category,coName,(orderCount*supPrice) supAmount, (orderCount*sellPrice) saleAmount, ((orderCount*sellPrice)-(orderCount*supPrice)) saleProfits from sale where title = #{title} ORDER BY category
